activities: Orbit Treasury Solutions, Inc. (OTS) may receive personal data of EU citizens who are registered as users of OTS’ Treasury Management Systems offerings (Orbit TMS) by their employer, a client of OTS that has licensed the Orbit TMS software. Such personal data includes name and corporate email address. OTS may receive personal data from EU citizens submitted to the OTS website. Such personal data is collected directly from the individual and includes name, contact information, and any information provided by the individual considered relevant to the purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: The personal data processed by OTS under the Safe Harbor Framework includes personal data of Orbit TMS software users and personal data submitted by EU citizens to the OTS website. The personal data covered includes off-line, on-line, and manually processed data.
